name: supportively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
approving in a way that shows you want to help and encourage someone: Try to listen supportively when your partner talks.
in a way that shows you agree with something and want it to succeed: He spoke supportively of the adminstration's policies. See
supportive
More examplesFewer examples Occasionally, Karen would chip in with the odd comment, and smile supportively.She is warm and maternal and nods supportively as I rant, wild-eyed, about my struggle to juggle home life, a baby, and a full-time job.The girls threw their arms supportively round each other. It is shocking to hear that the publisher continues to align itself so supportively with the arms trade. Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger has spoken supportively of the notion in recent months.
